text:
Christian Mbulu (6 August 199626 May 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played as a defender. Mbulu was born in Newham, England.
He played for Brentwood Town F.C. from 2013 to 2015. From 2015 to 2018, he played for Millwall F.C.. From 2019 to 2020, he played for Crewe Alexandra F.C.. In 2020, he played for Morecambe F.C..
Mbulu died on 26 May 2020 at his home in Cottam, Lancashire, aged 23.
